title: Speciality Restaurants bets big on AI, aims at Rs 1,000 cr revenue in 5 years
description: "We aim at reaching Rs 1,000 crore revenue in the next five years. Our stated goal is to double our current revenue in four years and triple it in six years, starting from the current level of Rs 400 crore," said Speciality Restaurants CMD Anjan Chatterjee.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
